ingredients: 1 lb dried of fresh pad thai noodles
1 tsp crushed dried red chilis or more if you like more heat
¼ lb medium raw shrimp, shelled and deveined
4 oz pressed bean curd/extra-firm tofu, cut into small cubes
½ cup chopped roasted peanuts, for garnish
¼ cup tamarind water or vinegar
1 Tbsp fresh lime juice and more for sprinkling later
